text: André Goosse (16 April 1926 - 4 August 2019) was a Belgian grammarian. He was known for his works on Le Bon Usage. In 1988, he married the Belgian writer France Bastia. He was a professor at the Université Catholique de Louvain. He was also the president of the Conseil international de la langue française.
